mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASKET(MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, BASKET_NAME, BASKET_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMAGE_ID) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{basketName}, #{basketPrice}, #{productImageId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_ID) FROM BASKET WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE BASKET SET BASKET_AMOUNT = BASKET_AMOUNT + 1 WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
UPDATE BASKET SET BASKET_AMOUNT = #{amount} WHERE BASKET_ID = #{bid}
mapper.select: SELECT BASKET_ID, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, B.PRODUCT_IMAGE_ID, BASKET_AMOUNT, BASKET_NAME, BASKET_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMAGE_NAME, PRODUCT_IMAGE_ROUTE, PRODUCT_IMAGE_EXTENTION FROM BASKET B LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE PI on B.PRODUCT_IMAGE_ID = PI.PRODUCT_IMAGE_ID WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS(MEMBER_MEMBER_ID, ORDERS_ORDER_DATE, ORDERS_PAYMENT, ORDERS_ADDRESS, ORDERS_POSTCODE, ORDERS_RECEIVER, ORDERS_DELIVERY, ORDERS_PHONE, ORDERS_CONTENT) VALUES(#{memberId}, now(), #{ordersPayment}, #{ordersAddress}, #{ordersPostcode}, #{ordersReceiver}, #{ordersDelivery}, #{ordersPhone}, #{ordersContent})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ORDERS WHERE MEMBER_MEMBER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY ORDERS_ID DESC limit 1
